roleset.name: display, showing, introduction of something new

example.name: just arg1
example.text: There is a scene at the end of the first week 's show where Mancuso attends the unveiling of the memorial to his dead partner David .
example.arg: of the memorial to his dead partner David
example.note: keep in mind, his dead partner David is not the audience.

example.name: font dorks! args 0 & 1.
example.text: Their unveiling of the font family Forza has me super stoked.

example.name: args1 and 2
example.text: In readiness for its unveiling to the public, the new Acne Studio on Dover Street's windows are covered in a collage of pages from the Acne Paper

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on unveil-v.01. No corresponding VNcls.
